title: JSON schema for Python function signature.

filename.description: The module's filename (assumes Python modules in source code have a 1:1 mapping).

functions.description: The functions found in this module.

id.description: The memory location of this function object

lineno.description: The the first line in the source code corresponding to this function.

arguments.description: The argument list for this function.

types.description: The set of types assumed by this argument.

empirical_probability.description: The empirical probability of observing this type for the argument. This value is computed by running the program. Its value may change with usage.
